item.title: CVE-2021-35115|2024-08-04T00:33:50.623Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Improper handling of multiple session supported by PVM backend can lead to use after free in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11268|2024-08-04T11:28:13.813Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Potential UE reset while decoding a crafted Sib1 or SIB1 that schedules unsupported SIBs and can lead to denial of service in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Mobile
